section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: This public offer (hereinafter referred to as the 'Offer') is an official offer by the Artist to enter into an agreement for the sale of artworks presented on this website. By submitting a purchase request, the Buyer accepts all terms of this Offer.

section2.title: 2. Subject of the Agreement
section2.content: The Artist undertakes to transfer ownership of the artwork to the Buyer, and the Buyer undertakes to accept and pay for the artwork under the terms specified in this Offer. The artwork includes:

section3.title: 3. Order and Payment
section3.content: The Buyer places an order by filling out the purchase form on the website. After receiving the order, the Artist contacts the Buyer to confirm details, discuss delivery methods, and arrange payment. Payment is made by agreement between the parties (bank transfer, cash, or other methods).

section4.title: 4. Delivery
section4.content: Delivery terms, methods, and costs are discussed individually with each Buyer. The Artist ensures safe packaging of the artwork. Risk of accidental loss or damage passes to the Buyer upon receipt of the artwork.

section5.title: 5. Returns and Exchanges
section5.content: Returns and exchanges are possible only in case of significant defects in the artwork that were not disclosed prior to purchase. The Buyer must notify the Artist within 3 days of receiving the artwork. Custom commissioned pieces are non-refundable.

section6.title: 6. Copyright and Intellectual Property
section6.content: The Artist retains copyright to all artworks. The Buyer acquires only ownership of the physical object. Reproduction, copying, or commercial use of the artwork's image without the Artist's written consent is prohibited.

about.title: About Bibisora
about.subtitle: Uzbek Artist & Creative Soul
about.bio: Bibisora is a talented Uzbek artist whose work bridges traditional Central Asian aesthetics with contemporary artistic expression. Her paintings explore themes of identity, cultural heritage, and the beauty of everyday life. Each artwork is created with passion and meticulous attention to detail, making every piece a unique treasure.
